prompts.text: What are you looking for right now?
You've come back three times today. What is your heart telling you?
prompts.text_es: Has vuelto tres veces hoy. ¿Qué te está diciendo tu corazón?

prompts.text: He sees you here. He loves you here. Do you want to stay?
prompts.text_es: Él te ve aquí. Él te ama aquí. ¿Quieres quedarte?

prompts.text: You've been here five times. That's okay. But what would it feel like to stop?
prompts.text_es: Has estado aquí cinco veces. Está bien. Pero, ¿cómo se sentiría parar?

examination_reasons.text: I need this app for something specific
examination_reasons.text_es: Necesito esta app para algo específico
